       Megatron entered the room to see Kitkat die, and then Drillbit whine 
over it. That was not the Predacon way...
       "I shall now assume complete control over the predacon forces within 
this base, as the next highest ranking officer it is my duty and privilage. 
Waspinator, move the body into a burial pod. We will leave cargo bay 5 open 
for the mourners. Now, Hell Beast and i shall go to the bridge to make some 
needed changes."

--part1_96.ca6e21f.2757058f_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2 FAMILY="SANSSERIF" FACE="Century Gothic" LANG="0"><B>       Megatron entered the room to see Kitkat die, and then Drillbit whine <BR>over it. That was not the Predacon way...

We will leave cargo bay 5 open <BR>for the mourners. Now, Hell Beast and i shall go to the bridge to make some <BR>needed changes."</B></FONT></HTML>
